language.set_success: ✅ You have successfully set this server's language to '{{selectedLanguage}}'

history.not_valid_steamid: ❌ Invalid steamID was given. I can only accept steamID, steamID3 or steamID64

match.fetch_failed: Failed to fetch match details. The match ID might be invalid or the server is down.

warnings.no_permission: ❌ You don't have permission to use this command!

errors.generic_error: ❌ Something went wrong. Please try again later...
errors.steam_not_yet_stored: ❌ You have not yet connected your Steam account. Please use: '/store' first!
errors.steam_player_not_found: ❌ Player not found. Try using SteamID instead!
errors.get_steam_id_type_failed: ❌ Could not detemine steam id type
